title: Serpent's Sacrifice
description: She never backs down from a fight When Alice’s aunt is murdered, she must take justice into her own hands. But becoming the vigilante known as the Serpent didn’t come with a guidebook. With one mistake, Alice unleashes a nightmare upon Jet City. Now the innocent are being turned into maniacal puppets, and time is running out. Seeking other vigilantes, Alice discovers her past might hold the key to unlikely allies. No matter the cost, Alice will end this fight. But is her determination enough to protect the city or will defeating the Phantasm demand a hero’s sacrifice? Serpent's Sacrifice , is the first book in The Phantasm Trilogy, a twist on popular superhero mythos. If you like brave heroines, chilling villains, and nail-biting action, then you'll love the thrilling emergence of The Serpent!
author: Trish Heinrich
